Script: 今日は一緒に温泉に入っています
Translate: Today we are in the spa together!

Script: まさかね、一緒にお風呂に入る仲になるなんて
Translate: I never thought we'd end up in the bath together
hanging out naked (e.g. at a public bath)​, isn’t it?

Script: 混浴しかないんだよね
水着ダサイのすごい気になるかもしれないんですけど
Translate: You might be curious about my out of fashion swimsuit
uncool, unsophisticated, unfashionable, out of fashion

Script: あの、これ借りたんですよ
そう、急遽入ることにしたから
Translate: Yes, because we decided to go in at short notice

Script: わたしもダサイよ、ヤバいよ
Translate: Mine is out of fashion too, it's not good!

Script: いや、なんかめちゃめちゃかわいいよ
バブル、スナックだよね
なんか似合ってわないんですけど
Translate: I don't think it looks good on me

Script: いや、似合わなくはないよ

Translate: not all, I would wear this

Script: ちゃんと着こなしてる
いや、着こなせてないでしょう
Translate: No, I am not wearing it well

Script: 無料で借りれたの強かったね
Translate: You were strong enough to borrow it for free

Script: お金かかると思ったら
Translate: If you think it costs money

Script: えっ、絶対かかると思ってた
Translate: Oh, I knew it would happen

Script: なんか前髪も少年みたいになっちゃった
Translate: Somehow my bangs have become like a boy

Script: えっ、さっきサウナに入ってからメイク直した
Translate: Eh, have you changed your make-up since you went into the sauna earlier?

Script: なんかもう、あそこまで忘れちゃうとね
Translate: I don't know, I've forgotten so much

Script: もう、どうでもいいやってなる
ほぼすっぴんだけどいいやって感じだよね
Translate: It's almost completely bare, but it's okay.

Script: 後ろ、のさ、映えとかヤバくない
Translate: It's not like it's going to look bad back there

Script: うちらの水着は生えてないけど
いやー、もう大自然ですね
Translate: Well, it's already a great nature!

Script: 温泉とサウナが結構趣味なの
Translate: I'm quite fond of hot springs and saunas

Script: 一人で銭湯とかもガンガン行ける
Translate: I can go to public baths by myself
clanging, banging, booming, loudly, throbbing, fully, vigorously

Script: 温泉好きなんだ、いけちゃん
ほんとはもっといろんなとこ開拓したいんだよね
Translate: I'd really like to explore more places
to feel around for, to search for, to investigate, to explore, to enjoy (natural beauty)

Script: マッサージ行くのも好きなんだけどさあ
Translate: I like to go for a massage

Script: うん、えっ、マッサージくすぐったいの
いや、もうそれ健康って事らしいよ
めっちゃ、くすぐったい
えっ、なんかさ、脇腹とかからさ
こう、サワッとさわられたとき
Translate: When you are touched like this
to touch, to feel, to get involved, to approach

Script: ううっん、みたいな声出しちゃう
どんなマッサージ行ってるの？
Translate: What kind of massage do you have?

Script: ちょっと怪しいマッサージ行ってるんじゃないの
Translate: I think you're getting a bit of a dodgy massage
suspicious, dubious, questionable, dodgy, shady, fishy

Script: いや、怪しいマッサージは言ってないんだけど
Translate: No, It wasn’t a suspicious massage

Script: あの普通のマッサージだよ
そんなソワッとか触ってくるかな
Translate: I wonder if I would be touch me like that

Script: もうゴリゴリやれない
Translate: I can’t undertake that hard already
with a scraping sound, with force; hard; vigorously, forcibly (carry out)
can’t do, can’t perform, can’t undertake

Script: 最初ファーストタッチ
ファーストタッチの時点で、だって

Translate: At this point, I feel like

Script: いけちゃん、感度が良過ぎるじゃないですか
そういう問題じゃないんじゃないですか、たぶん
Translate: That's not the point, I think

Script: えっじゃ、こちょこちょとかめちゃくちゃ弱い？
Translate: What, so you're really weak at rubbing?
absurd, unreasonable, nonsensical, extreme, incredibly, really, so, super

Script: えっ、混浴初めてきたかもしれない
Translate: I think I've never been in a mixed bath before

Script: 露天風呂はめっちゃくるけど
Translate: The open-air bath is very good

Script: いい湯だなって歌ってみて
Translate: Sing it like it's a good bath
to slide, to slip off, to get dislocated,  to deviate, to shift, to be out of sync

Script: ズレてるていうか一定音なんじゃないかな、たぶん
Translate: It's not out of tune, it's a constant sound, maybe

Script: わからない、音痴だからわからない
Translate: I don't know, I'm tone deaf, I don't know

Script: 私の中で100点のいい湯だった
Translate: It was a good bath, 100 points in my book

Script: いや、サウナね、過酷だったね
Translate: No, the sauna, it was tough

Script: ゆるい企画ばっかりだからさ
Translate: Because it's just a loose plan

Script: あんま体張ったことなかったもんな
あんなに体張ったの初めてかもしれない
Translate: I don't know if I've ever put my body on the line like that before

Script: 次はなにする？滝にうたれる？
Translate: What's next? Do you want to be hit by a waterfall?
to be struck, to be beaten
to hit, to strike, to knock, to beat, to drive in; to hammer in
advance arrangements, preparatory meeting, briefing session, overlap (of a coat, etc.)
to knock together; to strike against each other, to arrange (e.g. a meeting), to discuss
to drive in (e.g. nail, stake), to hammer in
to stop, to abort, to discontinue, to close
to strike against, to collide with, to bump into, to conflict, to encounter, to meet, clash
to hit (e.g. one's head), to strike, to crash into​

Script: いや、ほんとに滝に打たれたいと思ってね
Translate: No, really, I just wanted to be hit by a waterfall

Script: 高尾山とか行きたいと思って
Translate: I was thinking of going to Mount Takao or something

Script: 滝行しにいこう、なんか
Translate: Let's go to the waterfall, something

Script: 腐ったメンタルを叩き直すっていう企画
Translate: The project is to beat back the rotten mentality

Script: うちらメンタル腐ってるもんね
Translate: We've got mental rot, don’t we?

Script: 滝に打たれてメンタル直してきましょう
Translate: Let's go to the waterfall and fix our mentality

Script: くすぐったいって思っちゃうんじゃない？
Translate: I think you'll find it ticklish
I think it hurts, as expected

Script: ファーストタッチからすごい痛いから、多分
Translate: It hurts like hell from the first touch, so maybe

Script: それでくすぐったいとか
ソワソワするとかいったら

Translate: restlessly, nervously, uneasily, in a fidget​

Script: 滝行しながらくすぐったいっていってるんだよ
Translate: I'm tickling you with a waterfall

Script: でもいけちゃん、すぐったいっていい出しそうだけどね
Translate: But Ikechan, I think it's ok, though

Script: 私そういうヤバいとこあるかもしれない
Translate: I think I'm a bit of a mess

Script: ちなみにあの、反対側をうつしたい
Translate: By the way, I want to depict the other side
by the way, in this connection, incidentally

Script: ここでさ、全力で泳ぐやつやりたい
Translate: I want to do a full-on swim here

Script: どこを目指しているんでしょう
Translate: Where do we want to go?

Script: いや、でも貸してくれて嬉しいね
Translate: No, but I'm glad you lent it to me

Script: だって、なかったらうちら入れなかったよ
Translate: Because without it, you wouldn't have been able to enter

Script: こう中のパットがパカパカしてるんだけどさ
Translate: You know, the pads on the inside are popping

Script: うちもパカパカしてる
これ10年ぐらい前からあるのかな
Translate: This one's been around for about 10 years

Script: なんか迷走する気がする
Translate: I feel like I'm going astray

Script: いったんここで閉じよう

Translate: once, for a short time, briefly, temporarily
